front.title: Event Notification Management Information Base for DOCSIS Compliant Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it defines a basic set of managed objects for SNMP- based event notification management of DOCSIS compliant Cable Modems and Cable Modem Termination Systems. This MIB is defined as an extension to the DOCSIS Cable Device MIB.
